Author: fishervwb
Title: [ANN] ITO NOV 15 - PUBLIQ Network - Blockchain Distributed Media
Body: PUBLIQ — Case Study  As a UI/UX designer and researcher I have been spending the year exploring the idea of journalism, fake news, and new future possible user experiences. In short, I think Publiq is great, and I would love to get the word out on this service.  Publiq is a not-for-profit peer to peer distributed network that seeks to reward authors for creating accurate and meaningful content while at the same time building an ecosystem around smart news, and advertising in the hopes to give readers a way to get the most out of digital news. This media ecosystem is based on blockchain combined with a smart analytics system and AI. The goal is to fight fake news and clickbait misinformation. Today many news articles are duplicated or pirated and shared online, making it hard to trace the original content and author. This makes the ability for the writer to earn royalties more difficult.  https://medium.com/@m.aadilk96/publiq-case-study-43a254c2fa1c

Author: PUBLIQ.network
Title: [ANN] ITO NOV 15 - PUBLIQ Network - Blockchain Distributed Media
Body: Website | Team | White Paper | Press | Blog | Video  NEW REFERRAL PROGRAM: Refer and receive 5% or max. PBQ 15,000 for any contribution equal or greater than PBQ 1,500.  Get your personal link within your wallet or directly from https://ito.publiq.network   INITIAL TOKEN OFFERING IS LIVE NOW ACTIVE BONUS: 20% First 24h Only VISIT ITO.PUBLIQ.NETWORK  What is PUBLIQ PUBLIQ, a non-profit Foundation, is a blockchain distributed media ecosystem owned, governed and operated by a global independent community, whose members enjoy unlimited potential of free expression and enterprising, as well as full protection of their identity and intellectual property rights.  Technology PUBLIQ will use its own independent blockchain based on a modified Proof-of-Stake (PoS) consensus algorithm. The blockchain will hold account related information, transactions and content metadata. It will also introduce and support the PUBLIQ "PBQ tokens" to be used into the PUBLIQ ecosystem. PBQs will be partially distributed to Token Sale participants and also issued and distributed from the mining process. The consensus algorithm in the PUBLIQ network is PoS style, but with modifications. The main idea of the consensus is that miners will have a chance proportional to their stake size of being chosen to mine the next block.  [White Paper: Read More] Languages Available: EN / RU / JP  PUBLIQ Ecosystem Authors Free expression and instant, merit-based remuneration.  Channels A self-sustainable infrastructure to run a media business.  Advertisers Access to target audience without an intermediary.  Nodes Earn by validating PoS blockchain network and from transaction fees.  Seeders Support the distributed storage and earn by providing unused computer capacity.  Readers Benefit from the choice of AI powered unbiased content.  [Ecosystem: Read More]   Initial Token Offering (ITO)  Private invitation-only Pre-Sale Start: November 5, 2017 End: November 15, 2017 Currently raised: 1mn Bonus for the Pre-Sale: 40%  Public Token Sale Symbol: PBQ PBQ Price: BTC 0.00001 Start date: 15 November, 2017, 08:00:00 GMT End date: 15 December, 2017, 07:59:59 GMT Total token: 500,000,000 Maximum available for Toke Sale: 150,000,000 Minimum transaction amount: no minimum Accepted currencies: BTC, ETH and USD, EUR or any other currency available on exchanges  Bonus Program First 24h: 20% 2nd and 3rd day: 10% 4th to 7th day: 7.5% 8th to 14th day: 5%  Token Allocation 30% Token Sale 50% Mining 8% Reserve for Foundation 12% Team, early backers and partners  Fund allocation 45% Engineering & development 20% PR & marketing 15% Ecosystem building 15% Operations 5% Legal  Connect with us Facebook / LinkedIn / Twitter / Reddit / Instagram / YouTube / Telegram
